alert.note: Alert for Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 2:46PM CST until November 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: .A low pressure system will bring moderate to heavy snowfall to north-central Wisconsin Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Oneida County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to Midnight CST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will be across northwest Oneida county, with a fairly sharp gradient to lower amounts of snowfall towards southeastern Oneida.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
